mapper.insert: INSERT INTO post (content, fid, last_date, post_time, title, uid, picture) VALUES (#{content},#{fId},#{lastDate},#{postTime},#{title},#{uId},#{picture})
mapper.update: UPDATE post SET reading_num=reading_num+1 WHERE pid=#{pid}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM reply WHERE pid=#{pid}; DELETE FROM post WHERE pid=#{pid};
